## Description {#details}

Calculate the fragment of a variable to use when slicing a store based on the slice dimensions, existing fragment, and base storage fragment.

Results: UseFrag - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> as the new fragment. UseNoFrag - The new slice already covers the whole variable. Skip - The new alloca slice doesn&#39;t include this variable. FIXME: Can we use calculateFragmentIntersect instead?
